arts.ttl: Hoffenheim’s Fisnik Asllani swells with pride after ‘happy homecoming’ at Union Berlin
arts.sum: Hoffenheim striker Fisnik Asllani's mood remained sky-high after bagging a brace in his return to his old academy training ground.

arts.ttl: Asllani doubles up as Hoffenheim edge out Union Berlin in six-goal thriller
arts.sum: The 23-year-old marksman continued his fine form by netting a brace in a 4-2 win over 1.FC Union Berlin in Köpenick.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs. Hoffenheim preview: Hosts out to continue head-to-head winning run
arts.sum: Union Berlin will be looking to record a fourth consecutive head-to-head victory when they play host to Hoffenheim on Saturday.
